comment.author: 29001398@N00
comment._content: Just beautiful. My favourite time to watch the light change over the mountain is very early in the morning when it bathes in pink. Does the new lighting system interfere with the morning lights? (I have not been to Luxor since the lights were introduced).

comment.author: 83979593@N00
comment._content:
To Lenka P: Dawn and dusk are both great: one is pink the other purple. No, the new lighting system for the hills doesn't interfere with either. The lights go on well after sunset and go off well before sunrise, so it's the same magical light.
 
To AboZeid1428: Glad you liked the shot. I love the Nile too.

~Mary

comment.author: 29001398@N00
comment._content: Thank you for your answer, Mary! I am glad to hear this!
